products.name: Thelma Cocktail Dress
products.brandedName: Theia Thelma Cocktail Dress
products.description: Elevate your evening wardrobe with Theia's Thelma Cocktail Dress. This celebrity-favorite brand is known for its stunning evening gowns, cocktail dresses, and bridal wear. The cocktail dress features a vibrant passionfruit hue with a jacquard design, a jewel-embellished neckline, a keyhole bust, and a vented back hem. Measuring approximately 38 inches from shoulder to hem, this dress is designed to flatter. The model is 5'10' and is wearing a size 4, but please note that measurements may vary slightly by size. The dress fastens with a center back zipper and hook-and-eye closure.Made from 90% polyester and 10% nylon, this dress is luxurious and sophisticated. Ensure its longevity by dry cleaning only. Imported for your convenience, this cocktail dress is a must-have for any special occasion.

products.name: Palazzo Jumpsuit
products.brandedName: Ted Baker Palazzo Jumpsuit
products.description: Elevate your wardrobe with the Ted Baker Palazzo Jumpsuit. This stylish jumpsuit in black features a mock neck and self-tie back sash for a chic look. With a center back zipper and self-tie closure, this jumpsuit is both fashionable and comfortable. Made of 100% polyester and measuring approximately 58 inches from shoulder to hem, this jumpsuit is perfect for any occasion. Hand wash recommended. Imported. Model is 5'10 and wearing a size 2. Measurements may vary slightly by size. Add a touch of quirky and irreverent British fashion to your closet with Ted Baker.

products.name: Dawn Gown
products.brandedName: Theia Dawn Gown
products.description: Theia presents the stunning 'Theia Dawn Gown', a celebrity favorite for evening gowns, cocktail dresses, and bridal wear. This gown features an airy blue hue with a metallic floral mesh design, square neckline, and a 3D petal cascade at the hem. It measures approximately 60 inches from shoulder to hem and is available in various sizes. The gown is made of 100% nylon and should be dry cleaned only. It is imported and has a center back zipper with a hook-and-eye closure. Make a statement in this elegant and feminine gown from Theia.

Polo collar Short sleeves Half button-front closure 70% wool/20% silk/10% cashmere Lower body: 100% polyester Hand wash Imported SIZE & FIT Model measurements: 5'10" tall Model is wearing a US size Small ABOUT THE BRAND Synonymous with classic Americana style, Ralph Lauren started his collection of brands in 1967 with one item-the necktie-under the name Polo. Four years later, he debuted his first women's line, providing a segue to the debut of Ralph Lauren Collection. The epitome of polished dressing, the line's tailored coats, sweaters, trousers and more are both versatile and timeless. products.name: Proenza Schouler White Label Marley Dress
products.brandedName: Proenza Schouler White Label Marley Dress
products.description: Proenza Schouler White Label Marley Dress in Dark Fern, Size 0: Teeming with utilitarian details, this cotton-nylon dress is a true head-turner. Vertical seams trail down the bodice before turning into sharp box pleats. A quartet of glossy black buttons in the back can be undone to create a cool cutout. And see those self-ties? They can be tightened to boost the volume of the bubble hem.66% cotton, 34% nylon.

products.name: F-Luma Leather Demi-Wedge Penny Loafers
products.brandedName: FitFlop F-Luma Leather Demi-Wedge Penny Loafers
products.description: Our F-Luma offers a modern silhouette with a softer elegant look. A smart penny-loafer upper is set on a light wedge sole, featuring a 'cut out' heel. Here crafted in smooth supple luxe leather. Design touches include a slightly square toe, moccasin seaming and ribbing around the top of the sole. On a demi-wedge version of our Microwobbleboard™ midsole for unbeatable all-day comfort (and a little extra height). Team with everything from jeans to tailoring, your go-to gorgeous chunky loafer. These shoes have a ‘slim’ width fit, so may feel narrower than other styles on our Microwobbleboard™ midsole. If you have wider feet, consider sizing up for a more comfortable fit. Fitting: Please be aware that these loafers have a 'slim' width fit, so may feel narrower than other Fit Flop styles on the Microwobbleboard midsole. Ergonomically engineered to help optimize your body's alignment, natural movement & energy Light pressure-diffusing Microwobbleboard midsole – triple-density cushioning follows 3 footstep stages (firm heel/soft middle/medium at toes) Natural arch support Slim fit Grip level 2 – country paths/light trails Main lining – 15% spandex/85% PET polyester recycled from plastic bottle waste
